about_the_game:
The soundtrack for Pro Philosopher 2: Governments and Grievances has 25 all new original compositions by Matt Klingensmith, AKA Bleak Prospects. Chill beats you can philosophize to -- or do anything else to, really. Knock yourself out.

Included is a complete set of all 24 original compositions from the game, and a bonus track of the trailer theme song, available both as MP3s and high-quality WAV files.
detailed_description:
The soundtrack for Pro Philosopher 2: Governments and Grievances has 25 all new original compositions by Matt Klingensmith, AKA Bleak Prospects. Chill beats you can philosophize to -- or do anything else to, really. Knock yourself out.

Included is a complete set of all 24 original compositions from the game, and a bonus track of the trailer theme song, available both as MP3s and high-quality WAV files.
name: Pro Philosopher 2 Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 111 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 615 MB available space

short_description: Every groove from "Pro Philosopher 2: Governments and Grievances." 25 tracks in all!
